remarks: Composition of operator abstractions.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by David Abernethy, 23-Apr-2013.)
statement:
oprab2co.1 $e |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) -> C e. R ) $.
oprab2co.2 $e |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) -> D e. S ) $.
oprab2co.3 $e |- F = ( x e. A , y e. B |-> <. C , D >. ) $.
oprab2co.4 $e |- G = ( x e. A , y e. B |-> ( C M D ) ) $.
oprab2co $p |- ( M Fn ( R X. S ) -> G = ( M o. F ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d M x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d S x y $.
